Description: English Name. The geographical name value corresponding to the toponymic feature id in the CGNDB – Language field distinguishes French from English from Indigenous names.
French Name. The geographical name value corresponding to the toponymic feature id in the CGNDB – Language field distinguishes French from English from Indigenous names.

The name of the geographical names database this name is sourced from.  For Example: CGNDB =  Canadian Geographical Names Database. (https://www.nrcan.gc.ca/earth-sciences/geography/querying-canadian-geographical-names-database/canadian-geographical-names-database/19870)
The name identifier in the geographical names database.
